chinese: adl. 定期的，有规律的 n.正式队员
english: regular

chinese: 我们每个星期一早晨都有例会。
english: We have a regular meeting on every Monday morning

chinese: n.（问题等的）方面
english: aspect

chinese: 学生们正在记录关于这株植物成长的各个方面的信息。
english: Students are recording every aspect of the plant's growth

chinese: n. 家畜、牲畜
english: livestock

chinese: 家畜是指以出售或交易为目的而饲养的动物，如牛或羊。
english: Livestock refers to animals kept to be sold or traded, such as cattle or sheep

chinese: V 毁坏，弄糟，玷污
english: mar

chinese: 婚礼被这糟糕的天气给毁了。
english: The wedding was marred by the terrible weather

chinese: 几.局，司，处，社，所
english: bureau

chinese: 联邦调查局是美国调查犯罪的政府机构。
english: The Federal Bureau of Investigation is a government agency in the United States investigating crimes

chinese: v.处理，处置
english: dispose

chinese: 她正在处理不需要的蔬菜，把它们扔进垃圾箱。
english: She is disposing of the unwanted vegetables into the bin

chinese: 区 委任，任命，提名ad）.已受委派而尚未上任的
english: designate

chinese: 面试结束后，她被任命为公司的经理。
english: After the interview, she is designated as a manager of the company

chinese: n. 袋生、出現
english: occurrence

chinese: 考虑到目睹鲸鱼的事件极少出现，这些人可真是幸运！
english: Given that whale sightings are a rare occurrence, these guys are very lucky

chinese: 几.戏院，电影院，剧场
english: theater

chinese: 表演结束之后，戏院很快就空了。
english: The theater quickly emptied when the performance ended

chinese: ad.贵重的，有价值的 D。（复数）贵重物品
english: valuable

chinese: 这条粉钻项链是本店最贵重的商品。
english: This pink diamond necklace is the most valuable item in our shop

chinese: v. 打捞 n.从灾难中抢救出来的物资
english: salvage

chinese: 失事船只已从海里打捞上来了。
english: The wrecked ships have been salvaged from the sea

chinese: n. 碰撞；冲突
english: collision

chinese: 幸运的是，没人在两车碰撞中受伤。
english: Fortunately, no one was injured in the collision between the cars

chinese: n.失业；失业入数
english: unemployment

chinese: 在失业浪潮中，他丢掉了工作。
english: He lost his job in the wave of unemployment

chinese: acj.社会的；交际的，社交的
english: social

chinese: 人们在社交媒体上聊天和发照片。
english: People chat and post things on social media platforms

chinese: n.推动力；促进
english: impetus

chinese: 老板的表扬给了他更加努力工作的动力。
english: His boss's praise gives him the impetus to work harder

chinese: n。讽刺（作品）
english: satire

chinese: 这幅漫画讽刺了富人的贪婪。
english: The cartoon depicts a satire of rich people's greed
